description:
go.tools/ssa: fix breakage caused by CL 9839045 to go/types.

This removes the ast.CaseClase hack for implicit variables.

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/9863045/diff/5001/ssa/builder.go
File ssa/builder.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9863045/diff/5001/ssa/builder.go#newcode1622
ssa/builder.go:1622: //y2.Type_ = pointer(casetype)
remove this?

https://codereview.appspot.com/9863045/diff/5001/ssa/builder.go#newcode1631
ssa/builder.go:1631: // if id != nil {
ditto?

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=967564bb260d&repo=tools ***

go.tools/ssa: fix breakage caused by CL 9839045 to go/types.

This removes the ast.CaseClase hack for implicit variables.

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
